import React from "react"; const TypingArea = ({ typingText, inpFieldValue, timeLeft, timeLimit, mistakes, WPM, CPM, initTyping, handleKeyDown, resetGame, }) => { return (

{typingText}

  • Time Left:

    {timeLeft}s

  • Mistakes:

    {mistakes}

  • WPM:

    {WPM}

  • CPM:

    {CPM}
); }; export default TypingArea;
